            </summary>
            <remarks>
            To drag and drop rows between grids or to another component, <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridRowDropSettings.TargetID" /> property should be provided
            with the ID of the target grid or any other component.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSelection
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowSelection is set to true, it allows selection of (highlight row) Grid records by clicking it.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Selection can be further configured using <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSelectionSettings" /> component.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSorting
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowSorting is set to true, it allows sorting of grid records when column header is clicked.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Sorting can be further configured using <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridSortSettings" /> component.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowTextWrap
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowTextWrap set to true,
            then text content will wrap to the next line when its text content exceeds the width of the Column Cells.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Text wrap can be further configured using <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridTextWrapSettings" /> component.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ClipMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Defines the mode of clip. The available modes are,.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>Clip</term>
            <description>Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Ellipsis</term>
            <description>Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>EllipsisWithTooltip</term>
            <description>Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnChooserSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the column chooser in the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: KeySettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the cell movement keys in the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnMenuItems
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             ColumnMenuItems defines both built-in and custom column menu items.
            
             The available built-in items are,
              AutoFitAll - Auto fit the size of all columns.
              AutoFit - Auto fit the current column.
              Group - Group by current column.
              Ungroup - Ungroup by current column.
              SortAscending - Sort the current column in ascending order.
              SortDescending - Sort the current column in descending order.
              Filter - Filter options will show based on filterSettings property like checkbox filter, excel filter, menu filter.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnQueryMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            ColumnQueryModeprovides options to retrive data from the datasource.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>All</term>
            <description>It retrives whole data source</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Schema</term>
            <description>Retrives data for all the defined columns in grid from the data source.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>ExcludeHidden</term>
            <description>Retrives data only for visible columns of grid from the data source.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the schema of data source. Use <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumns" /> to add grid columns.
            If the Columns declaration is empty or undefined then the columns are automatically generated from data source.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ContextMenuItems
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             ContextMenuItems defines both built-in and custom context menu items.
            
             The available built-in items are,
              AutoFitAll - Auto fit the size of all columns.
              AutoFit - Auto fit the current column.
              Group - Group by current column.
              Ungroup - Ungroup by current column.
              Edit - Edit the current record.
              Delete - Delete the current record.
              Save - Save the edited record.
              Cancel - Cancel the edited state.
              Copy - Copy the selected records.
              PdfExport - Export the grid as Pdf format.
              ExcelExport - Export the grid as Excel format.
              CsvExport - Export the grid as CSV format.
              SortAscending - Sort the current column in ascending order.
              SortDescending - Sort the current column in descending order.
              FirstPage - Go to the first page.
              PrevPage - Go to the previous page.
              LastPage - Go to the last page.
              NextPage - Go to the next page.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CurrentAction
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the current action details.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: DataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Provides the data source for rendering grid rows. The data source value can be of any type
            that implements IEnumerable.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            To consume data from remote service or custom adaptor,
            <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Data.SfDataManager" /> component has to be used.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataSourceChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Invokes when data source changes.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableAdaptiveUI
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Render the Grid component as Adaptive mode based on Parent element. Also, it's render's the Grid filter, sorting and editing dialogs adaptively
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AdaptiveUIMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the Adaptive mode in grid. Setting this as both will render adaptive layout for both mobile and desktop, for Mobile - render adaptive layout only for smaller devices, for Desktop - render adaptive layout only for desktop. Also, it render's the Grid filter, sorting and editing dialogs adaptively.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the edit settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableAltRow
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableAltRow is set to true, the grid will render with e-altrow CSS class to the alternative tr elements.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableAutoFill
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableAutoFill is set to true, then the auto fill icon will displayed on cell selection for copy cells.
            It requires the selection mode to be Cell and CellSelectionMode to be Box.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableColumnVirtualization
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableColumnVirtualization set to true, then the Grid will render only the columns visible within the view-port
            and load subsequent columns on horizontal scrolling. This helps to load large dataset of columns in Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHeaderFocus
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableHeaderFocus set to true, then header element will be focused when focus moves to grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableVirtualMaskRow
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableMastRow set to true the Masked row append in the DOM elements.
            If set to false default virtual scrolling will work while enabling Enable Virtualization.
            In this feature Masked cells displayed until data cells retrieve.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableHover
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableHover is set to true, the row hover is enabled in the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Enabling this property will store the grid state such as column order, column width, sort information etc in the
            window.localStorage when the component is disposed.
            Users can also store grid state in data base instead of window.localStorage by using <see cref="M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid`1.GetPersistData" /> method.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableStickyHeader
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Sets the grid headers will be sticky, while scrolling the Grid's Parent div element. true then the user can able to make the column headers visible, when the document is scrolled; otherwise, false. By default, the property value is false. ...... ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableVirtualization
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableVirtualization set to true, then the Grid will render only the rows visible within the view-port
            and load subsequent rows on vertical scrolling. This helps to load large dataset in Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the filter settings of the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FrozenColumns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of frozen columns.
            </summary>
            <remarks>Specific column can be frozen using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn.IsFrozen" /> property.</remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFreezeLineMoving
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether allow the user to move the frozen line by dragging and dropping it. true if allowed to adjust freeze line; otherwise, false. By default, the property value is false. Enable FreezeLineMoving property that helps to increase/decrease the frozen columns by drag-and-drop the freeze bar between columns. .. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: FrozenRows
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of frozen rows.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GridLines
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the mode of grid lines. The available modes are,.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>Both</term>
            <description>Displays both the horizontal and vertical grid lines.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>No grid lines are displayed.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Horizontal</term>
            <description>Displays the horizontal grid lines only.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Vertical</term>
            <description>Displays grid lines based on the theme.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GroupSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the group settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the scrollable height of the grid content.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Height can be assigned with pixel and percentage values such as 100px, 100% etc.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: HierarchyPrintMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the hierarchy grid print modes. The available modes are.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>Expanded</term>
            <description>Prints the master grid with expanded child grids.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>All</term>
            <description>Prints the master grid with all the child grids.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>Prints the master grid alone.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PageSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the pager in the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PrintMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the print modes. The available print modes are.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>AllPages</term>
            <description>Print all pages records of the Grid.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>CurrentPage</term>
            <description>Print current page records of the Grid.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Query
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the external Query
            that will be executed along with data processing.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Additional parameters can be send along with request
            by using <see cref="M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Data.Query.AddParams(System.String,System.Object)" /> method.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: RowDropSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the row drop settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RowHeight
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the height of Grid rows.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RowRenderingMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the row rendering mode in grid. Setting this in vertical mode will render rows vertically with headers in the same row which suits better to use grid in small screens. In vertical row rendering mode, limited features are supported like filtering,sorting, Dialog editing, Selection, Searching and Row virtualization. 
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SearchSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the search behavior in the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectedRowIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the index of the row that is selected in the Grid.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The index of the selected row.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The SelectedRowIndex property allows you to specify the index of the row that should be selected when the Grid is initially rendered. The property value is updated dynamically as the user selects other rows in the Grid, allowing you to keep track of the currently selected row.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SelectionSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the selection settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowColumnChooser
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If ShowColumnChooser is set to true, it allows you to dynamically show or hide columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowColumnMenu
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If ShowColumnMenu set to true, then it will enable the column menu options in each columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the sort settings.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextWrapSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configures the text wrap in the Grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Toolbar
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Toolbar defines the ToolBar items of the Grid.
            It contains built-in and custom toolbar items.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            If an array value is assigned, it is considered as the list of built-in and custom toolbar items in the Grid's Toolbar.
            In some cases user may want to use custom toolbar instead of custom item, in such cases user can use
            <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridTemplates.ToolbarTemplate" /> property to provide custom toolbar.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the Grid width.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Width can be assigned with pixel and percentage values such as 100px, 100% etc.
            When the sum of total column width exceeds this value then the browser horizontal scrollbar will be displayed.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid<TValue>.ChildContent
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the child content.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.SfGrid<TValue>.ChildContent
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the child content.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the label value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Column
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the grid column
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsSelectAll
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies that the checkbox is select all.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the label value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Column
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the grid column
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsSelectAll
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies that the checkbox is select all.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the group title for the checkbox collections. 
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the group title for the checkbox collections. 
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridForeignColumn<TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ForeignDataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the column data source  which will act as foreign data source.
            </summary>
            <remarks>List or any IEnumerable type value is accepted as foreign data source.
            For custom binding or using remote service as foreign data source use
            <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridForeignColumn`1" /> component and configure data source using
            <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Data.SfDataManager" />.</remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the child content.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowEditing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowEditing set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column.
            By default all columns are editable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowAdding
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowAdding set to false, then it disables add operation of a particular column.
            By default all columns are editable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFiltering
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowFiltering set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column.
            By default all columns are filterable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowGrouping
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowGrouping set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column.
            By default all columns are groupable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowReordering
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowReordering set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column.
            By default all columns can be reorder.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowResizing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowResizing set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSearching
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowSearching set to false, then it disables searching of a particular column.
            By default all columns are searchable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSorting
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowSorting set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column.
            By default all columns are sortable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoFit
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AutoFit set to true, then the particular column content width will be
            adjusted based on its content in the initial rendering itself.
            Setting this property as true is equivalent to calling AutoFitColumns method in the DataBound event.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ClipMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term><see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode.Clip"></see></term>
            <description>Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode.Ellipsis"></see></term>
            <description>Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode.EllipsisWithTooltip"></see></term>
            <description>Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Used to render multiple header rows(stacked headers) on the Grid header.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Commands
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Commands provides an option to display command buttons in every cell.
            Use <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridCommandColumn" /> component to declare command columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CustomAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DefaultValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines default values for the component when adding a new record to the Grid.
            </summary>
            <remarks>If no default value is provided then the default value of the model property type will be
            used as initial value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisableHtmlEncode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If DisableHtmlEncode is set to false, it disables the encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayAsCheckBox
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If DisplayAsCheckBox is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditorSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the object to customize default cell editors. The following types can be used to customize default
            editors.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.NumericEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default numerictextbox editor.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DropDownEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default dropdown editor.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DateEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default datepicker editor.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.BooleanEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default checkbox editor.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the cell edit template that used as editor for a particular column.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type TValue.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditType
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the type of editor to be used for cell editing.
            </summary>
            <remarks>If EditType is not provided then the EditType will be inferred from the
            property type of the TValue.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableGroupByFormat
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableGroupByFormat set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values.
            By default columns are group by format.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Field
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource.
            The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc.,
            If the Field name contains dot, then it is considered as complex binding.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the filter template that used as filter UI for a particular column in FilterBar and Menu.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.PredicateModel" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ForeignKeyField
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source.
            If it is not defined then the Field will be considered as mapping column name.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ForeignKeyValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the display column name from the foreign data source which will be obtained from comparing local and foreign data.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Format
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data.
            Gets the format from the user which can be standard or custom formats.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the column template which is used to add customized element in the column header.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the header text of column which is used to display in column header.
            If HeaderText is not defined, then field name value will be assigned to header text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTextAlign
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Define the alignment of column header which is used to align the text of column header.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HideAtMedia
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Column visibility can change based on its Media Queries.
            HideAtMedia accepts only valid Media Queries.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Index
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the unique identifier value of the column. It is used to get the object.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsFrozen
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            You can use this property to freeze selected columns in grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsIdentity
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If IsIdentity is set to true, then this column is considered as identity column.
            This column will be in disabled state in add form.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsPrimaryKey
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If IsPrimaryKey is set to true, considers this column as the primary key constraint.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LockColumn
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source.
            If it is not defined then the Field will be considered as mapping column name.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the maximum width of the column in pixel or percentage, which will restrict resizing beyond this pixel or percentage.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the minimum width of the column in pixels or percentage.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowColumnMenu
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If ShowColumnMenu set to false, then it disable the column menu of a particular column.
            By default column menu will show for all columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowInColumnChooser
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If ShowInColumnChooser set to false, then hides the particular column in column chooser.
            By default all columns are displayed in column chooser.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortComparer
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the custom sort comparer function to implement own sort logic for a particular column.
            For foreign key column with local data source a sort comparer will be assigned by default to sort it by text(ForeignKeyValue) instead of the underlying field value.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Custom sort comparer cannot be used with remote data and Entity framework data source.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Template
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the column template that renders customized element in each cell of the column.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type <c>TValue</c>.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: TextAlign
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the alignment of the column in both header and content cells.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Freeze
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines which side the column need to freeze.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Type
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the data type of the column.
            </summary>
            <remarks>If Type is not provided then the Type will be inferred from the
            property type of the TValue.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Uid
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the unique identifier value of the column. It is used to get the object.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidationRules
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines rules to validate data before creating and updating. The validation rules can be set
            as instance of <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ValidationRules" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Visible
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If Visible is set to false, hides the particular column. By default, all columns are displayed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the width of the column in pixels or percentage.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the Checkbox Item template that renders customized element/value in each checkbox of the Filter column.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.FilterItemTemplateContext" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridForeignColumn<TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ForeignDataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the column data source  which will act as foreign data source.
            </summary>
            <remarks>List or any IEnumerable type value is accepted as foreign data source.
            For custom binding or using remote service as foreign data source use
            <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridForeignColumn`1" /> component and configure data source using
            <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Data.SfDataManager" />.</remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the child content.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowEditing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowEditing set to false, then it disables editing of a particular column.
            By default all columns are editable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowAdding
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowAdding set to false, then it disables add operation of a particular column.
            By default all columns are editable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFiltering
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowFiltering set to false, then it disables filtering option and filter bar element of a particular column.
            By default all columns are filterable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowGrouping
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowGrouping set to false, then it disables grouping of a particular column.
            By default all columns are groupable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowReordering
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowReordering set to false, then it disables reorder of a particular column.
            By default all columns can be reorder.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowResizing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowResizing set to false, it disables resize option of a particular column.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSearching
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowSearching set to false, then it disables searching of a particular column.
            By default all columns are searchable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowSorting
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AllowSorting set to false, then it disables sorting option of a particular column.
            By default all columns are sortable.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AutoFit
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If AutoFit set to true, then the particular column content width will be
            adjusted based on its content in the initial rendering itself.
            Setting this property as true is equivalent to calling AutoFitColumns method in the DataBound event.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ClipMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the cell content's overflow mode. The available modes are.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term><see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode.Clip"></see></term>
            <description>Truncates the cell content when it overflows its area.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode.Ellipsis"></see></term>
            <description>Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.ClipMode.EllipsisWithTooltip"></see></term>
            <description>Displays ellipsis when the cell content overflows its area also it will display tooltip while hover on ellipsis applied cell.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Columns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Used to render multiple header rows(stacked headers) on the Grid header.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Commands
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Commands provides an option to display command buttons in every cell.
            Use <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridCommandColumn" /> component to declare command columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CustomAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The CSS styles and attributes of the content cells of a particular column can be customized.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DefaultValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines default values for the component when adding a new record to the Grid.
            </summary>
            <remarks>If no default value is provided then the default value of the model property type will be
            used as initial value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisableHtmlEncode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If DisableHtmlEncode is set to false, it disables the encodes the HTML of the header and content cells.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DisplayAsCheckBox
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If DisplayAsCheckBox is set to true, it displays the column value as a check box instead of Boolean value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditorSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the object to customize default cell editors. The following types can be used to customize default
            editors.
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.NumericEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default numerictextbox editor.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DropDownEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default dropdown editor.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.DateEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default datepicker editor.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term><see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.BooleanEditCellParams" /></term>
            <description>Customizes the default checkbox editor.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the cell edit template that used as editor for a particular column.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type TValue.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EditType
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the type of editor to be used for cell editing.
            </summary>
            <remarks>If EditType is not provided then the EditType will be inferred from the
            property type of the TValue.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableGroupByFormat
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If EnableGroupByFormat set to true, then it groups the particular column by formatted values.
            By default columns are group by format.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Field
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the field name of column which is mapped with mapping name of DataSource.
            The bounded columns can be sort, filter and group etc.,
            If the Field name contains dot, then it is considered as complex binding.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterSettings
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Defines the filter options to customize filtering for the particular column.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the filter template that used as filter UI for a particular column in FilterBar and Menu.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.PredicateModel" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ForeignKeyField
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source.
            If it is not defined then the Field will be considered as mapping column name.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ForeignKeyValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the display column name from the foreign data source which will be obtained from comparing local and foreign data.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Format
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            It is used to change display value with the given format and does not affect the original data.
            Gets the format from the user which can be standard or custom formats.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the column template which is used to add customized element in the column header.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The parameters passed to the templates can be accessed using implicit parameter named <c>context</c>.
            The context is of type <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Grids.GridColumn" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderText
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the header text of column which is used to display in column header.
            If HeaderText is not defined, then field name value will be assigned to header text.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTextAlign
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Define the alignment of column header which is used to align the text of column header.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HideAtMedia
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Column visibility can change based on its Media Queries.
            HideAtMedia accepts only valid Media Queries.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Index
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the unique identifier value of the column. It is used to get the object.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsFrozen
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            You can use this property to freeze selected columns in grid.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsIdentity
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If IsIdentity is set to true, then this column is considered as identity column.
            This column will be in disabled state in add form.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsPrimaryKey
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If IsPrimaryKey is set to true, considers this column as the primary key constraint.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: LockColumn
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the mapping column name of the foreign data source.
            If it is not defined then the Field will be considered as mapping column name.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the maximum width of the column in pixel or percentage, which will restrict resizing beyond this pixel or percentage.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: MinWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the minimum width of the column in pixels or percentage.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowColumnMenu
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If ShowColumnMenu set to false, then it disable the column menu of a particular column.
            By default column menu will show for all columns.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowInColumnChooser
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If ShowInColumnChooser set to false, then hides the particular column in column chooser.
            By default all columns are displayed in column chooser.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortComparer
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the custom sort comparer function to implement own sort logic for a particular column.
            For foreign key column with local data source a sort comparer will be assigned by default to sort it by text(ForeignKeyValue) instead of the underlying field value.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Custom sort comparer cannot be used with remote data and Entity framework data source.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewFieldSettings<TValue>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Configure handlers to handle the field settings with the ListView component.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TValue">The generic type parameter.</typeparam>

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewFieldSettings<TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Child
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `Child` property is used for nested navigation of listed items.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the enabled state of the ListView component.
            You can disable the component using this property by setting its value as false.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GroupBy
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `GroupBy` property is used to wraps the ListView elements into a group based on the field value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `HtmlAttributes` allows additional attributes such as id, class, etc., and
             accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IconCss
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `IconCss` is used to customize the icon fo the list items dynamically.
             You can add a specific image to the icons using the `iconCss` property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Id
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the id field mapped in data source.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsChecked
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `IsChecked` property is used to check whether the list items are in a checked state or not.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Text
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `Text` property is used to map the text value from the data source for each list item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Tooltip
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `Tooltip` is used to display the information about the target element while hovering on list items.
            </summary>

            By default, the `checkBoxPosition` is Left, which will appear before the text content in a list item.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `CssClass` property is used to add a user-preferred class name in the root element of the ListView,
             using which you can customize the component (both CSS and functionality customization).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `DataSource` provides the data to render the ListView component which is mapped with the fields of ListView.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If `Enabled` is set to true, the list items will be enabled. 
            You can disable the component using this property by setting its value as false.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableVirtualization
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If `EnableVirtualization` is set to true, the ListViews performance will improve when loading a large amount of data.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTitle
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `HeaderTitle` is used to set the title of the ListView component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the height of the ListView component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `HtmlAttributes` allows additional attributes such as id, class, etc., and
             accepts n number of attributes in a key-value pair format.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Query
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `Query` is used to fetch specific data from the data source by using the where and select keywords.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCheckBox
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If `ShowCheckBox` is set to true, the checkbox will  be shown or hidden.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowHeader
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If `ShowHeader` is set to true, the header of the ListView component will  be shown or hidden.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If `ShowIcon` is set to true, the icon of the list item will  be shown or hidden.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortOrder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The `SortOrder` is used to sort the data source. The available type of sort orders are,
             `None` - The data source will not be sorted.
             `Ascending` - The data source will be sorted in ascending order.
             `Descending` - The data source will be sorted in descending order.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the width of the ListView component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GroupTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Template

<summary>
            The ListView supports customizing the content of each list item with the help of template property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the unique Id value for accordion component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            If we set the id, then the id value set for accordion element. The default value is `null`.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the child content of accordion component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to <c>true</c>, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfAccordion.ExpandedIndices" /> property is persisted.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Component's <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfAccordion.ExpandedIndices" /> property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.
            It is mandatory to provide <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfAccordion.ID" /> to persist <c>ExpandedIndices</c> property.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: LoadOnDemand
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to render all the accordion content on initial load or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            If we set <c>false</c>, then all the contents are rendered on initial load, The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the right to left direction is enabled for accordion component.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            true, the right to left direction is enabled for accordion component. The default value is `false`. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ExpandMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates options to expand a single or multiple panels at a time.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.ExpandMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.ExpandMode.Multiple" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>ExpandMode</c> is <c>Single</c>, only one <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.AccordionItem" /> will expand at a time.
            If the <c>ExpandMode</c> is <c>Multiple</c>, more than one <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.AccordionItem" /> will expand at a time.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ExpandedIndices
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the index of items that is expanded on the initial load. If we set the index value, then specified index items were expanded otherwise the default null value is set. Microsoft ASP.NET is a set of technologies in the Microsoft .NET Framework for building Web applications and XML Web services. The Model-View-Controller (MVC) architectural pattern separates an application into three main components: the model, the view, and the controller. JavaScript (JS) is an interpreted computer programming language. It was originally implemented as part of web browsers so that client-side scripts could interact with the user, control the browser, communicate asynchronously, and alter the document content that was displayed. @code{ int[] ExpandedIndices = new int[] { 0, 1 }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: ExpandedIndicesChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Invokes when index of expanded items were changed.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            Fired when expanded item index changes.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the height of the accordion element in pixels/number/percentage. If we set the height value, then the accordion will render based on specified height otherwise the default height value `auto` is set. ]]> If we set number values, then it is considered as pixels.

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the width of the accordion element in pixels/number/percentage. If we set the width value, then the accordion will render based on specified width otherwise the default width value `100%` is set. ]]> If we set number values, then it is considered as pixels.

BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will applied to the accordion element. Additional attributes can be added by specifying as in-line attributes or by specifying @attributes directive. It allows the accordion component to render non-declared attributes. The default value is `null`. ]]>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfAppBar
TagHelpers.Documentation: The AppBar displays the information and actions related to the current application screen. It is used to show branding, screen titles, navigation, and actions. AppBar component can be populated by specifying the child components within tag directive. Support to inherit colors from AppBar provided to SfButton, SfDropDownButton, SfMenu and SfTextBox. Set CssClass property with e-inherit CSS class to inherit the background and color from AppBar. The below example shows AppBar with Primary Button. Primary ]]> The below example shows AppBar with Buttons which inherits colors from AppBar. ]]> The below example, AppBarSpacer component used to align the Buttons on left and right. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Mode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets mode of the AppBar that defines the AppBar height. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.AppBarMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.AppBarMode.Regular" />
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Position
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets position of the AppBar.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.AppBarPosition" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.AppBarPosition.Top" />
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the custom classes to customize the AppBar component. Accepts single/multiple classes (separated by a space) to be used for AppBar customization. If we set the css class, then the custom class is applied for AppBar. The default value is string.Empty. In the below example AppBar background and color is customized using CssClass property. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsSticky
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets whether the AppBar position is fixed or not while scrolling the page. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, The AppBar will be sticky while scrolling. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the AppBar element. Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive. It allows the AppBar component to render non-declared attributes. TagHelpers.Documentation: Breadcrumb component is a graphical user interface that helps to identify or highlight the current location within a hierarchical structure of websites. The aim is to make the user aware of their current position in a hierarchy of website links. Breadcrumb items can be populated either by specifying property or by specifying within tag directive. and can be used to customize the Breadcrumb component UI using tag directive. In the below code example, a basic Breadcrumb component initialized with tag directive. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Url
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the Url based on which the Breadcrumb items are generated. The value as a Url string to generate Breadcrumb items. The default value is String.Empty. You can specify only absolute Url to this property. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Items
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the list of breadcrumb items that will be populated using the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.BreadcrumbItems" /> tag directive. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.BreadcrumbItems" />
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ActiveItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the of the active breadcrumb item. This property contains Url string of active breadcrumb item. This property is updated only when the has value. @code { private string activeItem = "https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/menu-bar/default-functionalities"; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaxItems
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the maximum number of breadcrumb items to be visible in the breadcrumb component.
            If the number of items exceeds this count, then items are rendered based on <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.OverflowMode" /> property. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            The number of breadcrumb items to be visible in breadcrumb component. The default value is <c>0</c>. 
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.MaxItems" /> is applicable only if the number of <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.BreadcrumbItem" /> is greater than <c>2</c>.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: OverflowMode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates how to display breadcrumb items when the breadcrumb items count exceeds <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.MaxItems" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.BreadcrumbOverflowMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <see cref="F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.BreadcrumbOverflowMode.Menu" />
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>OverflowMode</c> is <c>Hidden</c>, the exceeded items will be hidden and while clicking on the previous item, the hidden item will become visible.
            If the <c>OverflowMode</c> is <c>Collapsed</c>,  only the first and last items will be visible, and the remaining items will be hidden with collapsed icon.
            When the collapsed icon is clicked, all items become visible and scroll will be enabled if the space is not enough to show all items. 
            If the <c>OverflowMode</c> is <c>Menu</c>, it shows the number of breadcrumb items that can be accommodated within the container space, and creates a sub menu with the remaining items.
            If the <c>OverflowMode</c> is <c>Wrap</c>, it wraps the items on multiple lines when the Breadcrumbs width exceeds the container space.
            If the <c>OverflowMode</c> is <c>Scroll</c>, it shows an HTML scroll bar when the Breadcrumbs width exceeds the container space.
            If the <c>OverflowMode</c> is <c>None</c>, it shows all the items on a single line.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableNavigation
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the built-in item navigation is enabled or not. The breadcrumb component navigates to url based on the item clicked by user. true, if built-in item navigation is enabled; otherwise, false.The default value is true. You can handle navigation in using event by setting as false.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableActiveItemNavigation
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets whether the navigation is enabled for active item (last breadcrumb item). true, if the navigation is enabled for last breadcrumb item and it is clickable. otherwise, false.The default value is false.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to <c>true</c>, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.ActiveItem" /> property is persisted.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Component's <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfBreadcrumb.ActiveItem" /> property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the right to left direction is enabled for breadcrumb component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for breadcrumb component. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

            Gets or sets whether the breadcrumb component is disabled or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the breadcrumb component is disabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

ContextMenu is a graphical user interface that appears on the user right click/touch hold operation. In the below code example, showcases a basic context menu. ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfContextMenu<TValue> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Filter
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the filter selector in which element the context menu should be opened inside the sepcified target.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Target
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the target element selector in which the context menu should be opened.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowOn
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates an event to open the context menu.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OpenActionEvents
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates an event to open the context menu. Accepts a string value. The default value is contextmenu. The list of events supports to open the context menu are contextmenu, mousedown, mouseup, touchstart, mouseleave etc. The event must be different from CloseActionEvents. In the below code example, contextmenu event is set to open the context menu. Right click or touch hold to open the context menu. @code { private string OpenAction = contextmenu; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseActionEvents
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates an event to close the context menu. Accepts a string value. The default value is mousedown, touchstart. The list of events supports to close the context menu are mousedown, mouseup, click, touchstart, mouseleave, touchend. The event must be different from OpenActionEvents. In the below code example, contextmenu event is set to close the context menu. Right click or touch hold to open the context menu. @code { private string CloseAction = mousedown touchstart; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets the child content for the menu including HTML element. If the child content is not specified, menu is rendered using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.Internal.SfMenuBase`1.Items" /> property. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            The child content which is specified within <c>SfMenu</c> tag directive is either a string or HTML Element. The menu item is also specified using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.Internal.SfMenuBase`1.Items" /> property. 
            </remarks>

            </value>

<summary>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowItemOnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the mouse click option to show the sub menu. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the sub menu will open only on mouse click. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableScrolling

<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the scrollable option in menu bar.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OpenActionEvents
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates an event to open the context menu. Accepts a string value. The default value is contextmenu. The list of events supports to open the context menu are contextmenu, mousedown, mouseup, touchstart, mouseleave etc. The event must be different from CloseActionEvents. In the below code example, contextmenu event is set to open the context menu. Right click or touch hold to open the context menu. @code { private string OpenAction = contextmenu; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: CloseActionEvents
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates an event to close the context menu. Accepts a string value. The default value is mousedown, touchstart. The list of events supports to close the context menu are mousedown, mouseup, click, touchstart, mouseleave, touchend. The event must be different from OpenActionEvents. In the below code example, contextmenu event is set to close the context menu. Right click or touch hold to open the context menu. @code { private string CloseAction = mousedown touchstart; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Easing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the easing effect applied while transform.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Effect
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the effect that shown in the sub menu transform.
            The possible effects are:
             None: Specifies the sub menu transform with no animation effect.
             SlideDown: Specifies the sub menu transform with slide down effect.
             ZoomIn: Specifies the sub menu transform with zoom in effect.
             FadeIn: Specifies the sub menu transform with fade in effect.
            </summary>

            One of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfMenu`1.Orientation" /> enumeration. The default value is <c>Orientation.Horizontal</c>/> 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            If the <c>Orientation</c> is <c>Horizontal</c>, the menu items will be aligned horizontally. 
            If the <c>Orientation</c> is <c>Vertical</c>, the menu items will be aligned vertically. 
            </remarks>

            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the hamburger mode.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Orientation
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the orientation of menu whether it can be horizontal or vertical.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            One of the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfMenu`1.Orientation" /> enumeration. The default value is <c>Orientation.Horizontal</c>/> 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            If the <c>Orientation</c> is <c>Horizontal</c>, the menu items will be aligned horizontally. 
            If the <c>Orientation</c> is <c>Vertical</c>, the menu items will be aligned vertically. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Target
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the target element to open/close Menu while click in Hamburger mode.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the title text for hamburger mode in Menu.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets the child content for the menu including HTML element. If the child content is not specified, menu is rendered using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.Internal.SfMenuBase`1.Items" /> property. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            The child content which is specified within <c>SfMenu</c> tag directive is either a string or HTML Element. The menu item is also specified using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.Internal.SfMenuBase`1.Items" /> property. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets CSS class string to customize the appearance of menu. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of menu. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the right to left direction in menu bar.
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for menu bar. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Items
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the menu items with its properties which will be rendered as ContextMenu.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowItemOnClick
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the mouse click option to show the sub menu. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            <c>true</c>, if the sub menu will open only on mouse click. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableScrolling
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the scrollable option in menu bar.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.SfMenu<TValue>.ChildContent
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary> 
            Gets or sets the child content for the menu including HTML element. If the child content is not specified, menu is rendered using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.Internal.SfMenuBase`1.Items" /> property. 
            </summary> 
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value> 
            <remarks> 
            The child content which is specified within <c>SfMenu</c> tag directive is either a string or HTML Element. The menu item is also specified using <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Navigations.Internal.SfMenuBase`1.Items" /> property. 
            </remarks>
